trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you miss a phone call on your Android device.
This Trigger fires every time you answer a phone call on your Android device.

trigger: Incoming phone call from a specific number ends
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you answer a phone call on your Android device from a number you specify.

trigger: Incoming phone call from a specific number missed
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you miss a phone call on your Android device from a number you specify.

trigger: Outgoing phone call to a specific number ends
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you place a phone call on your Android device to a number you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you place a phone call on your Android device.
